title: type ID 'speak up' UC
content:
Dear Typophiles,

probably custom, but i’m looking for something similar...

Thank you

Marco

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821145010im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/header_02_4703.gif)

 [‹ Ricall Music Logo Sans Serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821145010/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41732 "Go to previous forum topic") [Hanwha logotype ID? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821145010/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41719 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Marco

comments.content:
I think this was just posted within the last week.  
It’s handlettered by Michael Clark and its based on the same style as his font P22 Pooper— only this is more upright. Not to be confused with brush lettering, Michael gets this look using a Speedbal B nib with some manipulation.  
Stephen

Thanks so much Stephen, I think it’s beautiful!  
best,  
Marcp
